title: How do I turn off the "good night" audio when going to bed with Pixel Stand?
content: When I start the Bedtime routine after putting my 3 on the Pixel Stand, it says "Good night, Hiker2099." This disturbs my wife who is already asleep. I need to set my alarm at that point, but don't want the audible "Good night, Hiker 2099." The phone is in Do Not Disturb mode when I put it on the Stand, yet it says the "Good night" every time.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
